studyMetadata.title: A3 Experiment
authors: Ha Chu, Yanhong Liu, Conor McCoy, Benjamin Perry
studyMetadata.description: A variation of the Cleveland & McGill graphical perception task

horizontalBarChart.description: A bubble chart with correct answer of 0.66
horizontalBarChart.instruction:
Two values are marked with dots. 

What percentage do you believe the smaller value represents relative to the larger value?
